sections.heading: 1800.1 through Section 3 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "Alarm, Locksmith and Fire Sprinkler Industry Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1985, c. 217, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1985. Amended by Laws 2006, c. 110, ยง 1, eff. Jan. 1, 2007; Laws 2012, c. 368, ยง 2, eff. Nov. 1, 2012; Laws 2015, c. 172, ยง 1,
